research_list.name: Sunbit
research_list.market_position: Leading in AI-driven financial technology with a focus on point-of-sale financing and BNPL solutions.
research_list.future_outlook: Continued expansion into international markets, leveraging its technology for real-life applications, and strategic acquisitions to strengthen its competitive position.
research_list.investment_potential: High due to its rapid growth, strong revenue growth, and innovative solutions in the fintech sector.

research_list.name: Human Interest
research_list.market_position: Dominant in the digital payment and recurring revenue sectors, with a focus on expanding into international markets.
research_list.future_outlook: Potential for growth through international expansion and partnerships, leveraging its revenue growth and technological advancements.
research_list.investment_potential: High due to its sustained revenue growth and strong market position in the digital payment industry.

research_list.name: Pune Finance Startups
research_list.market_position: Dominant in the Pune region with a focus on digital payment innovations and 401(k) plans, serving a significant portion of the local financial ecosystem.
research_list.future_outlook: Potential for growth through organic expansion and partnerships with local financial institutions, leveraging its strengths in digital payment solutions.
research_list.investment_potential: High due to its strong market presence in Pune and innovative offerings in digital finance.
